level.heading: Mayor’s report to Council.
level.text: The Mayor shall submit to the Council, not later than 6 months after the end of each fiscal year, a report on the financial condition of the fund and the results of the operation of the fund for the fiscal year.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 7-96
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-96, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-2201.
